g.text: Request state data from FPN
Create state token, associate with local session
Return state token, scopes, client id and authorization endpoint
Open tab to FxA's /authorization page w/ state token
User authenticates, authorizes
Generate OAuth code
Return OAuth code
Redirect with OAuth code, state token
Send OAuth code and state token to XPI
Send OAuth code and state token to FPN
Check state vs state stored in local session. If match, continue
Using server held client_secret, trade code, state for access_token, refresh_token
Return access_token, refresh_token w/ scope=`profile https://identity.mozilla.com/apps/secure-proxy`
Associate refresh_token with session in the DB
Use refresh_token to fetch access_token w/ `profile` scope
Return access_token w/ `profile` scope
Store the profile_token in the DB
Use access_token to fetch profile info
Return profile info, including subscription info
Return profile, passes data
Return profile, passes data
Display profile info
Activation request
Request a proxy_token from FPN with the state token
Retrieve the refresh_token from the DB using the state token
Use refresh_token to fetch access_token w/ `profile` scope
Return access_token w/ `profile` scope
Store the profile_token in the DB
Use access_token to fetch profile info
Return profile info, including subscription info
Check if there is an existing valid proxy_token in the DB
Check if user is allowed to consume a new pass
Use refresh_token to fetch access_token w/ `https://identity.mozilla.com/apps/secure-proxy` scope
Return proxy_token w/ `https://identity.mozilla.com/apps/secure-proxy` scope
Store the current proxy_token in the DB
Return proxy_token, profile info and passes data
Return proxy state
Display profile info
Send network traffic to secure proxy w/ access_token sent in Proxy-Authorization header
Verify access token, verification succeeds
Forward network traffic
Return network responses
Return network responses
